    • Method Detail

      • addParameter

        public static void addParameter(org.apache.http.client.utils.URIBuilder uri,
                java.lang.String parameterName,
                boolean value)
        Add a boolean parameter to the URI.

        Adds the string value of the boolean value to the URI.

        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to add the parameter to.
        parameterName - The name of the parameter to add.
        value - The value of the parameter to add.

      • addParameter

        public static void addParameter(org.apache.http.client.utils.URIBuilder uri,
                java.lang.String parameterName,
                java.lang.Object value)
        Add the string value of the value as a parameter to the URI.

        If the value is null then no parameter is added.

        Parameters:
        uri - The URI to add the parameter to.
        parameterName - The name of the parameter to add.
        value - The value of the parameter to add.

      • getCookiesToProxy

        public static java.util.List<KeyValuePair> getCookiesToProxy(boolean isCookiesEnabled,
                                             java.util.List<KeyValuePair> currentCookies)
        Examine the list of cookies passed looking for ones that should be forwarded.
        Parameters:
        isCookiesEnabled - If false an empty list is returned.
        currentCookies - The list of cookies.
        Returns:
        The list of cookies to be forwarded.

      • getParameterValue

        public static java.lang.String getParameterValue(java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> pairs,
                                 java.lang.String parameter)
        Examine the list of NameValuePairs looking for an entry whose name matches the passed parameter.
        Parameters:
        pairs - List of NameValuePairs to examine.
        parameter - The name of the entry to look for.
        Returns:
        Value of a matching entry if found, null otherwise.

      • extractParameters

        public static java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> extractParameters(java.lang.String url)
                                                                       throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Extract the parameters from the passed URL.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to extract the parameters from.
        Returns:
        The list of parameters, as a list of NameValuePairs.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
